faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Crypulse services and cryptocurrency trading.

answers.what: Crypulse is a comprehensive cryptocurrency trading platform that allows you to buy, sell, and manage digital assets securely. We provide fast transactions, competitive rates, and top-tier security for all your crypto needs.
answers.secure: Yes, security is our top priority. We use industry-leading encryption, multi-signature wallets, cold storage solutions, and comply with strict regulatory standards including KYC/AML policies to protect your assets and personal information.
answers.payment: We accept major payment methods including Visa, Mastercard, PayPal, bank transfers, and various other payment options depending on your region. All payments are processed securely through our verified payment partners.
answers.time: Most crypto purchases are completed within minutes. Bank transfers may take 1-3 business days to process. Crypto-to-crypto swaps are typically instant, while crypto sales to fiat may take 1-2 business days to reach your account.
